body_content.explanation: the whole physical structure that forms a person or animal:
examples: A good diet and plenty of exercise will help you to keep your body healthy.
She rubbed suncream over her entire body.

body_content.explanation: the main part of a person's or animal's body, without the head, or without the head, arms, and legs:
examples: He had a fat body but thin legs and arms.
A body was washed up on the beach last week.

body_content.explanation: the painted metal shell of a vehicle, such as a car or an aircraft

examples: How is a body supposed to live in these conditions?

body_content.explanation: a piece of tight-fitting women's clothing that covers the top half of the body and fastens between the legs
a group of people who have joined together for a particular reason:
examples: The sport's governing body announced changes to some rules for the coming season.
Chatsworth High School's student body raised £5,000 for the charity.
The committee serves as an advisory body to the organization.
The RSPCA is a respected body working for animal welfare.
There is a large body of people who are unaware of their basic rights.

body_content.explanation: If people do something in a body, they do it together as a group, in an official way:
examples: The cleaning staff went in a body to the manager to complain.
There is a growing body of evidence to support their claim.
She collected a huge body of information on the subject.
A substantial body of opinion (= a large group of people with the same opinion) is opposed to any change.

body_content.explanation: A body of water is a large area of water, such as a lake.
the main part of a book, article, etc.:
examples: I thought the most interesting details in the book were not in the body of the text, but in the notes at the end.

body_content.explanation: the main part of a large building:
examples: to enter the body of the cathedral
The distance between the two bodies in space was measured daily.
This Bordeaux has plenty of body (= strong flavour).
Conditioner can give your hair more body.
